mapper.select:
select id from sys_error_info
and ( or url like CONCAT('%',#{cm.keyword},'%') or instance like CONCAT('%',#{cm.keyword},'%') or exception like CONCAT('%',#{cm.keyword},'%') or method like CONCAT('%',#{cm.keyword},'%') or uuid like CONCAT('%',#{cm.keyword},'%') or status like CONCAT('%',#{cm.keyword},'%') or agent like CONCAT('%',#{cm.keyword},'%') or name like CONCAT('%',#{cm.keyword},'%') or user_id like CONCAT('%',#{cm.keyword},'%') or ip like CONCAT('%',#{cm.keyword},'%') )
